channel.title: Predictive on Me + coffe + data : a love ∆

item.title: Case Based Reasoning System for MSRP estimation
item.description:
Introduction Employed data, scripts and a brief description can be found at the original repository. Further references can be found at the page of Prof. Ian Watson. library(FNN) library(here) library(magrittr) library(tidyverse) source(here::here("code/calc_KNN_error.R")) theme_set(theme_bw())
Data Overview Data has the following attributes: Make: Make of the car; Model: Model of the car; Year: Manufacturing Date; Engine.Fuel.Type: Kind of fuel the engine runs on; Engine.
